summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Short Bob Wavy Glueless Lace Front Wigs for Women Synthetic Hair Wigs 27# Blond Heat Resistant Fiber Middle Parting 14 inch Review Date: 2019/07/18 Store: Newworld Hair Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '12 x 2 x 2 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Wavy', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'Newworld Hair', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'Yes', 'Product Dimensions': '12 x 2 x 2 inches; 8.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '651312012702'} Review Text: Pretty realistic wig
This wig is flat ironable but when I flat ironed this wig after it appeared all different legnths after. It looked afterwards like I hacked my hair bad. The color was nice though and the front was also natural Review Title: Worth the money Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: eNilecor Short Hair Wigs Pixie Cut Light Blonde Natrual Curly Wigs for Women with Side Bangs Trendy Synthetic Wig with Wigs Cap (7.8" Blonde) Review Date: 2019/10/19 Store: eNilecor Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '8.3 x 4 x 1.6 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'eNilecor', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '8.3 x 4 x 1.6 inches; 8.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '711508239747', 'Manufacturer': 'eNilecor'} Review Text: This is the worst wig I've ever bought on Amazon and I've bought dozens. I wear a wig every day so when I ordered this well I didn't expect it to be zeon yellow. But it was. Also when I put it on OMG I laughed and laughed at just how bad it actually was. Don't buy this! Review Title: Zeon yellow,worst wig on Amazon I've ever bought Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: NOBLE Lace Frontal BOB Wig for Women|10 inch What Lace 13X7 HD Lace Wig Transparent|Realistic Synthetic Luvme Blonde BOB Wigs | FAST DELIVERY Review Date: 2020/05/11 Store: NOBLE Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'NOBLE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.63 x 7.72 x 2.13 inches; 10.3 Ounces'} Review Text: I own over 90 wigs and right now this one is my favorite. Its basically a 360 wig meaning the almost entire wig is totally hand tied onto all lace. Theres only a couple of tracks on the bottom the rest is entirely lace. The lace matches my white skin so well i don't even need glue. These pictures are the wig right out of the box. I couldn't be happier with my purchase right now. I love this more than my $350 bob wig! Amazing its only $40 Review Title: Best hairline I've ever seen on a wig under $100 Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Suttie Wig Tripod Stand Cork Head Heavy Duty Mannequin Head Adjustable Wig Making Head Stand Tripod THZJ Review Date: 2020/05/11 Store: Suttie Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '32.5 x 4 x 4 inches; 4.1 Pounds'} Review Text: I was suprised how well made and sturdy this product is Review Title: Great price very well made Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
This individual's purchase history reveals a nuanced approach to consumer behavior focused on hair products, particularly wigs. Key patterns emerge from their ratings and sentiments, highlighting a mix of satisfaction and disappointment across different products. While they appreciated realistic styles and affordability, such as in the case of a well-crafted lace wig, they expressed significant dissatisfaction with a poorly received synthetic wig, indicating a high sensitivity to quality.

Common themes around product purposes show a preference for versatility in wig styling, with heat-resistant options being valued. The individual leans towards products that enhance personal appearance while seeking impressive quality-to-price ratios, as seen in their enjoyment of a budget-friendly wig that outperformed higher-priced alternatives.

Quality preferences reflect a desire for realistic appearance and comfort, emphasizing products that don’t require extensive maintenance or glue. Price sensitivity is evident; their willingness to spend on wigs is counterbalanced by stringent expectations regarding performance, especially noted in the disappointment expressed with lower-quality items.

Overall, the core preferences illustrate a shopper who prioritizes realistic, high-quality hair products that offer good value while being open to exploring budget options that meet aesthetic expectations.

target_interaction.title: Gorgeous wig
target_interaction.text: This is a beautiful wig for the money. The pictures I posted are straight out of the box. The pictures still have the lace on. I did that to show the color of lace is actually light enough for a very white person. I can't wait to wear it out after I cut and style I suggest dry shampoo as it does have a sheen to it.
